entities.name: NUANCE COMMUNICATIONS, INC.
entities.description: Nuance Communications, Inc. is an organization that is set to be acquired by another company for $56.00 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at $19.7 billion, inclusive of Nuance's net debt. The acquisition has been approved by Nuance's shareholders, and is expected to close by the end of calendar year 2021, subject to the satisfaction of certain regulatory approvals and other customary closing conditions.
